attributes.action: Abolish the vehicle annual excise licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish the annual vehicle excise licence and replace it with additional TAX on fuel. The current Vehicle Excise Licence penalises low mileage road users, it is expensive to collect and it is open to avoidance! Please SCRAP IT and charge additional TAX at the PUMPS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
